==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|げつ|よう|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
/getueu/ > /getuyoː/. Originally it meant the moon<ref name="Amoghavajra" />. A [[calque]] of {{cog|la|dies Lunae}} and its descendants. Compare {{m|ja|月|tr=tsuki|gloss=moon}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|/ɡetsujoː/|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|げつよう|hhira=げつえう}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic}} the [[moon]]
# [[Monday]]

====Synonyms====
* {{l|ja|月曜日}} (getsuyōbi)

===See also===
* {{l|ja|七曜}} (shichiyō)
